<page title>: Cleverboxes - 860-10150 | Dell UltraSharp U2412M 24 inch Full HD LED Monitor 1000:1 300cd/m2 1920x1080 8ms DisplayPort/DVI-D/VGA (Black)
certifications: ENERGY STAR 5.1, EPEAT Gold, TCO Certified Displays
description: Connect a keyboard, mouse and other peripherals via USB ports, DisplayPort and DVI ports that can deliver outstanding image quality when viewing HD content. Position your monitor just the way you like with comfort-enabling features like tilt, swivel and rotate. IPS (in-plane switching) technology helps ensure a great view from almost any angle. Make colours cooler or warmer to suit your preference with the colour temperature slider, while 'Text mode' automatically adjusts screen brightness to 150 nits, ideal for reading text.
in the box: Monitor with stand • Power cable • Power adaptor • DVI cable • USB cable • VGA Cable • Drivers and Documentation media • Quick Setup Guide • Safety Information
